articles.title: Murders of 2 girls and 2 young women in Canada in the 1970s linked to American serial rapist - CBS News
articles.description: Police said Gary Allen Srery might also be linked to other unsolved murders and sexual assaults in Western Canada.
articles.content: Canadian police announced Friday they have linked the deaths of two 14-year-old girls and two young women nearly 50 years ago to a now deceased U.S. fugitive who hid in Canada from the mid 1970s to t… [+4639 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Supreme Court Justice Alito's home flew US flag upside down following Jan. 6-NYT - Reuters
articles.description: An American flag was photographed hanging upside down at the Virginia home of Supreme Court Justice Samuel Alito in January 2021, weeks after the Jan. 6 protests, the New York Times reported on Thursday.

articles.author: Kim Bellware
articles.title: American doctors stuck in Gaza call on lawmakers to stop sending weapons to Israel - The Washington Post
articles.description: Trapped volunteers call on the United States to stop sending weapons to Israel, as the closure of the Rafah border crossing cuts the flow of food and medical supplies.
articles.content: Battle wounds and grisly injuries dont often faze Adam Hamawy. The 53-year-old reconstructive plastic surgeon and U.S. Army veteran who served as a combat trauma surgeon in Iraq has seen the burned s… [+115 chars]
